mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (name, position, department, salary) VALUES (#{name}, #{position}, #{department}, #{salary})
mapper.select: SELECT c.name AS comp_name, e.name AS emp_name, e.position AS position, ce.join_date AS join_date FROM comp_emp ce JOIN company c ON ce.comp_id = c.id JOIN employee e ON ce.emp_id = e.id
